evidence.claim: Pivotal Analytics utilizes AWS for cloud services.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards for healthcare data handling.
Pivotal Analytics implements Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.
Apache Kafka is used for real-time data streaming at Pivotal Analytics.
Integration with EHR systems is part of their health-tech solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of specific use cases for X12 transactions or API automation on their site.
